data.trans: Tránh cái gì, ngăn không cho ai dính líu đến hoặc bị ảnh hưởng bởi điều gì
data.trans_hint: Tôi muốn tránh xa những tranh cãi về tiền bạc.
data.en_hint: I prefer to keep out of arguments about money.
data.content_game_1: I prefer to keep out of arguments about money.
data.answer_en_hint: I prefer to keep out of arguments about money.

data.trans_hint: Nếu cậu đi theo trục đường chính, cậu sẽ không bị lạc.
data.en_hint: If you keep to the main road, you won't get lost.
data.content_game_1: If you keep to the main road, you won't get lost.
data.answer_en_hint: If you keep to the main road, you won't get lost.

data.trans: Giữ ai tránh xa khỏi thứ gì
data.trans_hint: Ba mẹ có trách nhiệm giữ con cái của mình tránh xa những nội dung có yếu tố người lớn trên internet.
data.en_hint: It's parents' responsibility to keep their children away from adult content on the internet.
data.content_game_1: It's parents' responsibility to keep their children away from adult content on the internet.
data.answer_en_hint: It's parents' responsibility to keep their children away from adult content on the internet.

data.trans_hint: Khối lượng công việc dày đặc khiến tôi bận rộn suốt mấy hôm gần đây.
data.en_hint: My heavy workload has been keeping me busy as of late.
data.content_game_1: My heavy workload has been keeping me busy as of late.
data.answer_en_hint: My heavy workload has been keeping me busy as of late.

data.trans: Giữ cho ai kiêng thứ gì
data.trans_hint: Tôi đang cố kiêng món gà rán vì tôi đang tăng cân nhanh quá.
data.en_hint: I'm trying to keep myself off fried chicken as I'm putting on weight quickly.
data.content_game_1: I'm trying to keep myself off fried chicken as I'm putting on weight quickly.
data.answer_en_hint: I'm trying to keep myself off fried chicken as I'm putting on weight quickly.

data.trans_hint: Các giáo viên có nhiệm vụ giữ cho học sinh trật tự trong suốt buổi mít tinh.
data.en_hint: Teachers are supposed to keep their students quiet during the meeting.
data.content_game_1: Teachers are supposed to keep their students quiet during the meeting.
data.answer_en_hint: Teachers are supposed to keep their students quiet during the meeting.

data.trans: Tập trung vào vấn đề chính
data.trans_hint: Cái bạn vừa đề cập không liên quan đến vấn đề đang thảo luận, chúng ta nên tập trung vào vấn đề chính.
data.en_hint: What you just mentioned is not relevant to the topic we are discussing, then we should keep to the point.
data.content_game_1: What you just mentioned is not relevant to the topic we are discussing, then we should keep to the point.
data.answer_en_hint: What you just mentioned is not relevant to the topic we are discussing, then we should keep to the point.

data.trans: Kìm hãm, kiểm soát thứ gì
data.trans_hint: Những chính sách tốt do nhà nước triển khai vẫn đang kiểm soát tốt dịch bệnh.
data.en_hint: Right policies conducted by the government are still holding the pandemic in check.
data.content_game_1: Right policies conducted by the government are still holding the pandemic in check.
data.answer_en_hint: Right policies conducted by the government are still holding the pandemic in check.
